summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OMNISupply.io Phase 4 features including enhanced product catalog with IT Equipment (laptops/monitors), IT Services with hourly rates, multi-language support (EN/FR/DE), and all core functionalities. All 24 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 24 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Login flow with demo credentials (demo@infosys.com / demo123 / USA)
Product catalog displays with high-quality images and brand logos (Bosch, HP, Dell, Siemens, etc.)
Product cards show: ratings (5-star), reviews count, expandable specifications, availability (units + warehouse), delivery options with pricing
IT Equipment products visible when searching for 'laptop' - shows HP ProBook, BenQ, Logitech laptops with UNSPSC 43211500
Services tab shows IT Services (Network Installation $125/hr, Wireless Network Setup $350/AP, Desktop Deployment $85/device)
Services display hourly/per-unit rates with supplier logos (Infosys, Cisco, Dell)
Language switching updates ALL UI text - tested EN, FR, DE successfully
French UI: Catalogue, Commandes, Ajouter au Panier, Vérifier le Stock, En Stock, Sponsorisé
German UI: Katalog, Bestellungen, In den Warenkorb, Bestand Prüfen, Auf Lager, Gesponsert
Currency changes based on selected country - France returns EUR (€) with 0.92 rate
Add to Cart functionality working - shows item with UNSPSC code and price
PunchOut transfer modal shows all 5 systems (Coupa, SAP Ariba, SAP ERP, Ivalua, Oracle)
PunchOut transfer completes with 'Transfer Successful!' and 'Pending Customer PO' status
Submit RFQ modal with Description, Quantity, Brand Name, Delivery Location fields
RFQ submission successful with toast notification
Sidebar navigation with translated labels in all languages
InfoCoins balance displayed (2,800+ coins)
Alternates section shows savings percentages (Save up to 33%)
Delivery options from multiple partners displayed
seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests with TEST_ prefix for cart items, RFQs, and quotations

mocked_apis.PunchOut transfer: MOCKED - Creates transfer record but doesn't connect to real ERP systems (Coupa, SAP Ariba, Oracle, etc.)

enhanced_product_catalog.details: Amazon-like display with ratings, reviews, expandable specifications, availability info, delivery options, alternates with savings %

it_equipment_products.details: HP/Dell/Lenovo/BenQ laptops visible with UNSPSC 43211500, monitors with UNSPSC 43211900

it_services.details: Network Installation ($125/hr), Device Deployment ($85/device), Managed IT ($75/user/month), Cybersecurity Assessment ($5500)

brand_logos.details: High-quality logos from Wikipedia displayed for Bosch, Siemens, HP, Dell, Cisco, etc.

multi_language.details: EN/FR/DE/IT/NL all translate sidebar, buttons, badges, search placeholders, filters

currency_by_country.details: USA=USD, France/Germany/Italy/Netherlands=EUR with correct conversion rates

add_to_cart.details: Products and services can be added to cart with UNSPSC codes displayed

punchout_transfer.details: Transfer to Coupa/SAP Ariba/SAP ERP/Ivalua/Oracle creates record with 'Pending Customer PO' status

submit_rfq.details: Free text RFQ submission with description, quantity, brand, delivery location

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Phase 4 features tested and working. Enhanced product catalog with IT Equipment (laptops, monitors, networking) and IT Services (Network Installation, Device Deployment, Managed IT, Cybersecurity) are fully functional. Multi-language support (i18n) works for all 5 languages (EN/FR/DE/IT/NL). Currency correctly changes based on country selection. PunchOut transfer is simulated/mocked - creates transfer records but doesn't connect to real ERP systems.
